answers.answer: YAY!!! I'm so glad it went well!

question: I went to my diabetes appt today and found out that.....I DON"T have gestational diabetes, my 2 hour glucose test retake came back perfect...I no longer hav to test my blood, deal with a certain diet or even continue seeing this special doctor! I am sooo happy!
title: YAY! Awesome doc appt today!
